CustomField.description: NO DAMAGE MINOR DAMAGE - minor water staining, no drywall/base removal required, minor touch up paint required, minor landscape damage MODERATE DAMAGE - 1 room of carpet/pad/base, less than 100sf of drywall, moderate paint damage, minor damage to roof, siding/stucco and/or windows, moderate landscape damage MAJOR DAMAGE - multiple rooms of carpet/pad/base, more than 100sf of drywall, structural, HVAC, electrical & plumbing damage, major damage to roof, home exterior and windows
CustomField.label: Damage Condition
